pages.text: The $(d)Block Breaker$() will break the block in front of it. It has the equivalent of an Iron Pickaxe.$(br2)Blocks broken will be placed into an inventory behind it, or dropped on the ground.$(br2)It can be disabled with a Redstone signal.
pages.title: Block Breaker

pages.text: The $(d)Diamond Breaker$() can be used on the Block Breaker to upgrade it, making it equivalent to a Diamond Pickaxe.$(br2)It can also be enchanted, and the enchantments will be applied when breaking blocks!
pages.title: Diamond Breaker
